config.start-from-bottom.name: Start From Bottom
config.start-from-bottom.tooltip: Whether the messages should be displayed at the bottom or top upon opening the Log Menu.
config.oldest-to-newest.name: Oldest to Newest
config.oldest-to-newest.tooltip: Whether the messages in the Log Menu should be displayed from oldest (top) to newest (bottom) or vice versa.
config.non-npc-dialogue.name: Non-NPC Dialogue
config.non-npc-dialogue.tooltip: Whether to include dialogue from interacting with objects, furniture, etc.
config.toggle-hud-messages.name: HUD Messages
config.toggle-hud-messages.tooltip: Whether to include HUD messages (e.g., "New Journal Entry". Does not include HUD messages from collecting items.
config.log-limit.name: Maximum Dialogue Lines
config.log-limit.tooltip: Maximum number of dialogue lines to display in the menu.
config.log-menu-button.name: Log Menu Button
config.log-menu-button.tooltip: Key to press to open the Log Menu.
